name: Long Beach

name: Sixteen Mile Beach
description: Yzerfontein, just 90 km up the West Coast from Cape Town, is a small harbour town that is home to one of South Africa’s longest uninterrupted beaches. Sixteen Mile Beach stretches on for, well we’re guessing, 16 miles?! Another epic white sand beach ...

name: Llandudno
